storyInfo: Flint puts on an act for the lord ameer's scouts and manages to fool them, buying Inam some time.

attributes.content: Do it! Whack him!
attributes.name: Excited Archosauria

attributes.content: Yeah! Swipe him from the right!
attributes.name: Excited Archosauria

attributes.content: That's right! Just like that! Hell yeah! Beat up this outsider moron!
attributes.name: Rowdy Archosauria

attributes.content: Good one! Show this outsider the true strength of the Tiacauh Warriors!
attributes.name: Rowdy Archosauria

attributes.content: Whoa, that's ruthless... Are they sworn enemies or something?
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Huh? Enemies? Who cares? We'll find out once they're done!
attributes.name: Excited Archosauria

attributes.content: Exactly. It's just a fight! What's the big deal?
attributes.name: Rowdy Archosauria

attributes.content: Eh, speaking of, I've never seen you around. You new here?
attributes.name: Rowdy Archosauria

attributes.content: Right, I'm a merchant doing some trading here and there. Just got here today.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: I heard there are quite a few tribes here, and figured I could make some money...
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Oh! A merchant! That means you're... uh... you sell stuff, right? Good! We welcome people who sell stuff here!
attributes.name: Rowdy Archosauria

attributes.content: But slow down a little. Whatever you've got, it can wait till after the show!
attributes.name: Rowdy Archosauria

attributes.content: But this...
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Eh, look! Got him! Beautiful!
attributes.name: Excited Archosauria

attributes.content: Tiacauh warriors always win!
attributes.name: Excited Archosauria

attributes.content: ...Tch.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: This how you guys treat all your guests?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Hah, don't make me laugh.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: You're the one who started it, and you want to be treated like a guest?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: I already told you. I really didn't see you.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: The transport's door's a bit too tall. I thought you'd gotten on already.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: I'll swap the door out for a transparent one later.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Cut the crap. Let's go!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: I'm my tribe's strongest warrior... and we'll find out right now which of us is stronger.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Do it, shorty! Show me the vigor you had when you wiped the floor with us!
attributes.name: Excited Archosauria

attributes.content: That's right, shorty! Jump up and use that super quick punch of yours to beat him up!
attributes.name: Rowdy Archosauria

attributes.content: Maybe you want to take care of them first?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: ...That's none of your business!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Hiss...
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: You're unarmed, but I have a weapon.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: So what?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: You can't win.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: I'll say this now. I'm not letting go of my weapon.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Have it your way.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: But you don't get to decide who's going to win! You'll have to take it up with my fists!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: What a savage...
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: It's been so long since you left this place, but you haven't learned a thing other than the common tongue.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: But I can see that... a place like this...
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: ...suits a headstrong prick like you just fine.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Hey, sounds like he's complimenting us!
attributes.name: Rowdy Archosauria

attributes.content: That's right! Only here in Acahualla can a warrior be born this tiny... but with such big fists!
attributes.name: Rowdy Archosauria

attributes.content: Huh? He's complimenting us? T-Then... are we still doing this?
attributes.name: Excited Archosauria

attributes.content: *cough*... I don't think that's a compliment...
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: You barbarians...
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Hmph... say all you want.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: The Tiacauh warrior's tone has a hint of stiffness. Her eyes sweep the crowd in front of her.
She pauses momentarily as her gaze lands on a certain person.
I'll remember this. I'm going to come settle the score with you later!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: If you outsiders are going look down on us Tiacauh warriors, then maybe you should get out of Acahualla!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Yeah, that's the idea.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: If it wasn't for you barbarians not having even the tools to fix up a car... Uhh...
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: (We wouldn't be wasting our time here!)
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: ...We wouldn't be wasting our time here.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Well, who knew your metal junk would break down during the trip?!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Hey, you over there.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Stop looking around. I'm talking to you!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: M-Me?
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Right, you. You said you're a trader, right?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Uh, yes. Yes, I am.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: You've got anything that can patch up wounds? Give me some of that. The kind that works extra fast.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Is there something you want? I'll trade you for it.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Um... You need to pay for it.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: What a pain... The last trader we had was okay with trading for things. How come we can't do that?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Maybe because you threatened the last guy with your fists?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Stay out of this!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Are you sure we can't trade? I have lots of good stuff. If you're okay with it, I can bring you to my place and trade you something there. That's the hottest place in all of Acahualla!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: If you indeed have something good to offer, then of course we can barter.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Yeah!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: That actually worked?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Well, this is business. Naturally, we need to be flexible. Haha.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: So, do we leave now to this... Aac... Acah...
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Acahualla.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Right, Acahualla. The hottest place in Acahualla. I need to take a good look at this place. Perhaps I will be able to make a few deals there.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Haha, I'm sure you will!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Follow me!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: What, now? Are they seriously gonna stop, just like that?
attributes.name: Excited Archosauria

attributes.content: Where are they going? No one goes that way normally. What are they doing that way? Hunting?
attributes.name: Rowdy Archosauria

attributes.content: Who knows... Eh, if there's no fight, let's get going. Let's see if that redhead outsider finished putting together that 'Forest Mk. VII' yet!
attributes.name: Excited Archosauria

attributes.content: Let's go! Inam's not around for the next couple of days. I want to take that giant thing we got apart to see what's inside!
attributes.name: Rowdy Archosauria

attributes.content: *pant*...*pant*....
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: A-Are we there yet?
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Almost.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Stay close. There are lots of wild beasts around here. I can't guarantee your safety if you get lost.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Huh? Didn't you say we were going to the hottest place in town? How come there are beasts?
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: What's so weird about it? We're Tiacauh warriors. Of course we live in places where there are beasts.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: It's only when you can head into the rainforest and beat the most ferocious beasts on your own that you have proven yourself as a warrior!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Well, if that isn't amazing...
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: You were fighting that Feline man earlier without any weapons. Do all the warriors here fight like that?
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: More or less. Some use spears since that's easier to fight beasts with, but I don't need them.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: All I need are my fists!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Haha, with how amazing you are, I'd say you really don't need anything else.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Right, I heard what the Feline was saying too. Something about a broken down transport?
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: So you came back here with them, from the outside?
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: ...You caught even that?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Eh, well... I just happened to overhear it.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Also, your common tongue is superb. Where did you learn to speak it? Outside Sargon?
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: If you heard it, you heard it. What are you so tense for?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: A while back, a bunch of outsiders came here and told us they could take us outside to make some big bucks.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Oh, I see! And you followed them?
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Hell no! Do I look like I'm that bored?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: I only went with them because they had a lot of tough fighters with them!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: But in the end, they kept assigning me to protect some worthless loser who always stayed inside some metal box. No way I'm doing that! Outsiders are so weird. They're all a bunch of wusses, but they keep calling the shots.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: That's why I didn't even ask for any money and came right back.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Normally, those stupid lumps would've been long gone, but they're dawdling around because they keep saying their metal box has broken down.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Who knows how to fix those metal boxes anyway?! And there are all those weird metal thingies. I've never even seen those things!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: I mean, it's not like you guys would have any repair equipment...
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: What did you just say?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: *cough*... I mean... repairing transports is no cake walk.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Have the Acahualla warriors ever considered acquiring some tools for convenience?
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Such as?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Such as, uh, that Feline's transport... or some kind of robot that could automatically help you with your tasks.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Not interested.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: What would I do with those? I'm willing to bet those gaudy metal trinkets wouldn't last a single punch of mine.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Well, that's weird.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: What's weird?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: To tell you the truth, I came to Acahualla to try my luck at business because I heard rumors about this place.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: But... I guess there's probably not many opportunities for that.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Huh? What do they say about us outside?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Is it how prestigious the Tiacauh warriors—
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Uh, that's got nothing to do with it.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Tch.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: I heard the tribes here are large and prosperous, that they've mastered quite a lot of robotics technologies, and they've even started trading with the outside.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: From the looks of it, they were nothing more than rumors.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: But it's too soon to jump to conclusions. As a merchant, you have to be patient and attentive. I'd still like to have a look around.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Maybe I'll run into a big tribe like from the rumors!
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: ...What's that supposed to mean? Are you saying I'm lying?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Where's this coming from?
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: —Wait, don't move!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Hide behind me.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Hurry! Stop dawdling!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: —A big one's coming.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Alright, we're safe. Come out.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: You actually managed to beat that huge pack of beasts all by yourself...
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: That's nothing. Didn't I tell you? You'll only have proven yourself as a warrior if you can beat the most ferocious beasts on your own!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: This pack's huge, otherwise I would've had an easier time.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: No need to thank me. I was the one who brought you into the rainforest.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: ...Didn't you say you weren't going to guarantee my safety?
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Fine, let's get your wound taken care of. Give me a moment. Let me look for some medicine and bandages.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Here, they're yours to keep. We'll call this your payment for protecting me earlier.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Oh! You sure about that?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: I'm sure. Take them.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Eh, this really isn't quite like what they said outside.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: In hindsight, I guess I shouldn't have trusted those rumors.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Hold on.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Why shouldn't you have trusted those rumors?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: What? Do you mean...?
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: Our tribe's big and prosperous! There's no doubt about that!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: We can have up to forty or fifty people going out on a hunt at once!
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Watch out! Why are you losing your footing all of a sudden?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: I-It's nothing. I walked a bit too much, and my legs are getting sore... Are we there yet?
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: What's the rush? We're getting close. It's just up ahead.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: I guarantee it'll open your eyes.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: You're back. How was it?
attributes.name: Calm Woman

attributes.content: ...Worthless.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader

attributes.content: What happened to your face?
attributes.name: Calm Woman

attributes.content: Eh, don't get me started. I ran into a bunch of barbarians who've got nothing but muscles growing in their brains. They said I had to fight their warriors to go inside the village, then they immediately welcomed me with a punch in the face.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader?

attributes.content: The village was small and rundown. They hardly have any people there, and they haven't even seen transport repair tools before. What a waste of time!
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader?

attributes.content: Did you find anything on your end?
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader?

attributes.content: Nothing. I took a stroll in the other direction and found a redhead Vulpo fixing his transport. He said he was going to take me on a ride once it was fixed.
attributes.name: Calm Woman

attributes.content: I followed him around a little, and there were only some rundown houses.
attributes.name: Calm Woman

attributes.content: Though it kind of felt like he didn't want me poking around too much. Something didn't feel right about that.
attributes.name: Calm Woman

attributes.content: If you ask me, I think there's nothing to the rumors.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader?

attributes.content: You sure? You remember what the Padishah ordered us to do, right?
attributes.name: Calm Woman

attributes.content: Of course, but the results couldn't be more clear.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader?

attributes.content: At the very least, we've found no developing power here, and there's nothing we can gain from this place either. The Messenger stationed here wasn't lying.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader?

attributes.content: But according to the gossip...
attributes.name: Calm Woman

attributes.content: I just think something doesn't add up about all this.
attributes.name: Calm Woman

attributes.content: You said it yourself. It's just gossip.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader?

attributes.content: The Messenger here... Our intel calls her Inam. She liked to trade and barter to begin with, so I'm not surprised the rumors got blown out of proportion.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader?

attributes.content: Besides...
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader?

attributes.content: If the lords ameer take control of the territory here and it doesn't meet their expectations, having painted a rosy picture is only going to get us in trouble.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader?

attributes.content: ...Fair enough.
attributes.name: Calm Woman

attributes.content: You're right. They're a bunch of barbarians who do nothing but compare who's got the bigger fists. How could they possibly have fooled the two of us?
attributes.name: Calm Woman

attributes.content: Let's go back to the city and let the Padishah know.
attributes.name: Swept-Up Trader?

attributes.content: All taken care of?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: How were things on your end?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: We hid all the machines and metal choppers in a cave nearby. Nobody saw us.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: And we reminded everyone in the tribe not to talk about machinery in front of any outsiders.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Good work. Now we just need to wait till Inam's back.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: She left a letter and disappeared without a trace. Tch.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Right, that wound on your face...
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Sorry, you can punch me back at the training grounds next time.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Really, don't worry about it.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Chiave probably would've been better at putting up that show, though.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: We didn't have a choice, since there was more than one of them. I asked Chiave to take care of the other person.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Actually, we could've gotten through this without that fight, but...
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: But?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: I couldn't help myself.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: I'll bash your face in at the training grounds next time.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Haha, just kidding.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: But now those guys definitely consider us a bunch of barbarians who only think about fighting.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: I took that guy to an old, abandoned settlement that's only used as a rest stop by warriors traveling outside the tribe, and he suspected nothing.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: You can't say that for sure.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: It's fine as long as he can't be sure of anything either.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: As long as they don't get to the bottom of it, they won't report anything to their higher ups.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: —That's what the Doctor said.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: True.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: They're just lackeys. They're bound to avoid the riskier option.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: That's right! Besides! With me on the job, nothing can possibly go wrong!
Man, that was exhausting. You know how much work it is to take apart a transport and then put it right back together?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Sorry, but that's the only excuse I could come up with.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: If you need me to pay for it...
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: No need! It's a piece of cake! We used to do this stuff all the time back when we were running cons... I mean, when we ran our old business. Don't believe me, ask Broca!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Wait... Hahahahaha! Broca, your face! Hahahahaha! That's hilarious!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: ...Shut up.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Hahahahahahaha!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Ahem. Okay, back on topic.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Now that they're gone, we should be able to keep the status quo for a while longer. Inam, Zumama, and Gavial are all away. We'll have to settle for this.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Those guys won't give up that easily.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: I guess that's true. If this was going to be that simple, Inam wouldn't have asked me to hold the fort.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Yeah... I'll have my tribesmen keep an eye out around the rainforest. If any of them come back, we'll deal with it somehow.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Whoa.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: ...What?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Man, I didn't expect the boss, that Inam, to trust you so much!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I only ever see you follow Blaze around. You don't even talk to the other operators from here all that much. I really didn't think you'd come all the way back like they did the moment you got that letter.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: It's true. I don't keep in contact with my tribe much.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Thankfully, I was in Columbia not too long ago. Inam gave me a call and asked me to bring a bunch of discarded metal choppers.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: I'm not really too sure why she trusted me with this...
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: You brought all those here?
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: You have an eye for them. They can be put to good use once they're fixed up.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Why wouldn't she trust you? She saw how much you've grown. It's a good thing!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I followed you guys here thinking I could help come up with ideas when push came to shove, but looks like you didn't need me at all.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You're always fighting Broca, so I thought you were the kind of girl who rushes right up to your opponents to beat them up.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I did kind of do that, too.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Never mind.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Acahualla's changed a lot, and the tribe has all these funny looking... machines. I really have no idea how they learned to put them together.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: I thought Zumama's stuff was weird enough, but at least those things were shaped normal.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: The ones they made are pretty interesting, if you ask me.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: As long as it's practical.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: That's true. At the very least, life's gotten much better with these machines.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Really? If you guys came up with a machine that planted crops and hunted on its own, your Tiacauh warrior fists wouldn't mean anything for much longer.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: You seriously don't care even a little?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Hey, Chiave!
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Eh, I'm just curious!
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: I lost the right to determine my tribe's direction the moment I left my tribesmen behind.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: If the Tiacauhs chose this, then there's no problem. I don't understand what these machines are all about, but I trust the people here.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Fair enough.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Besides, I've thought about things while I was on Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: ...If everything could be solved by beating up your enemies, I wouldn't have so much to worry about.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: There was this time when... uh... I accompanied the Doctor as a bodyguard to a business meeting with a company, and they really tried to boss us around right from the start.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: It happens.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: I couldn't help myself, so I beat them all up.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: ...It happens.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: Ahh... Yeah, that can be a pain in the ass to deal with.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: How come the Doctor didn't stop you?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Of course they did, so I beat them up while the Doctor was asleep.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Hey, hold on. I think I heard about this.
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: So you were the one who wanted to give the Doctor more rest and stood guard outside the door, and ended up beating up all the guys who came looking for trouble?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Don't remind me...
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: The deal almost fell through because of that, but we managed to save it at the expense of the Doctor's sanity.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: ...Anyway, I gave everyone lots of trouble that time.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Good thing the Doctor was there. They didn't give you a hard time, right?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Not at all. Actually, after we got back to Rhodes Island, they told me that fists really do mean everything.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: But our fists have to be big enough for that to work... and we don't always have what it takes yet, so we have to come up with other ways to solve our problems.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Fair point.
attributes.name: Broca

attributes.content: M-Makes sense...
attributes.name: Chiave

attributes.content: Hold on.
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Did you hear something just now?
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Phew, finally.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Stop musing. We need to get to work.
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Hm? How come there are all these machines here?
attributes.name: Eunectes

attributes.content: Is that...
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Hey, Kemar, good to see you.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Judging by the look on your face, I'm guessing nothing bad happened.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Everything turned out okay in the end, I guess...
attributes.name: Flint

attributes.content: Good. Then I suppose you chased them all away? I knew you were the right one for the job.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I have plenty of other things I need your help with, but for now...
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I need all of you to help us clear some space for a village. Acahualla is going to see a large crowd of visitors from the underground soon.
attributes.name: Inam
